statements: SELECT sensor_id, temperature, timestamp FROM smart_thermostat_sensor_data
SELECT temperature, sensor_id, timestamp FROM smart_thermostat_sensor_data
SELECT * FROM smart_thermostat_sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT timestamp, temperature FROM smart_thermostat_sensor_data WHERE temperature > 25
SELECT sensor_id, temperature FROM smart_thermostat_sensor_data WHERE timestamp >= '2021-10-01'
SELECT * FROM smart_thermostat_sensor_data ORDER BY sensor_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT sensor_id, temperature FROM smart_thermostat_sensor_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS average_temp FROM smart_thermostat_sensor_data;
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp FROM smart_thermostat_sensor_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2020-12-31';
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, temperature FROM smart_thermostat_sensor_data WHERE sensor_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT thermostat_id, timestamp, temperature FROM smart_thermostat_data WHERE thermostat_id = 1
SELECT * FROM smart_thermostat_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT location, model FROM thermostat_metadata WHERE thermostat_id = 2
SELECT AVG(temperature) FROM smart_thermostat_data
SELECT thermostat_id, location FROM smart_thermostat_data JOIN thermostat_metadata USING (thermostat_id) ORDER BY thermostat_id ASC
SELECT * FROM smart_thermostat_data WHERE thermostat_id = 1;
SELECT timestamp, temperature FROM smart_thermostat_data WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT location, model FROM thermostat_metadata WHERE thermostat_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM smart_thermostat_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT thermostat_id, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp FROM smart_thermostat_data GROUP BY thermostat_id;
SELECT * FROM thermostat_data
SELECT thermostat_id, temperature FROM thermostat_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT thermostat_id, location_name FROM thermostat_location WHERE location_id = 100
SELECT * FROM thermostat_metadata WHERE manufacturer = 'Nest'
SELECT MAX(temperature) FROM thermostat_data
SELECT thermostat_id, temperature, timestamp FROM thermostat_data WHERE thermostat_id = 1;
SELECT thermostat_id, location_id, location_name FROM thermostat_location ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT thermostat_id, model, manufacturer, firmware_version FROM thermostat_metadata WHERE manufacturer = 'Nest' ORDER BY firmware_version DESC;
SELECT thermostat_id, location_id, location_name, timestamp FROM thermostat_location INNER JOIN thermostat_data ON thermostat_location.thermostat_id = thermostat_data.thermostat_id;
SELECT t1.thermostat_id, t1.temperature, t2.location_name FROM thermostat_data t1 JOIN thermostat_location t2 ON t1.thermostat_id = t2.thermostat_id WHERE t1.thermostat_id = 3;
SELECT thermostat_id, temperature FROM ThermostatData WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM ThermostatLocation WHERE location = 'Living Room';
SELECT model_name, manufacturer FROM ThermostatModel WHERE manufacturer = 'Nest';
SELECT thermostat_id, status FROM ThermostatHealth WHERE status = 'OK';
SELECT DISTINCT thermostat_id FROM ThermostatData WHERE temperature < 15;
SELECT * FROM ThermostatData WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, temperature FROM ThermostatData WHERE thermostat_id = 3;
SELECT MAX(temperature) AS max_temp, MIN(temperature) AS min_temp, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp FROM ThermostatData;
SELECT location, model_name, manufacturer FROM ThermostatLocation JOIN ThermostatModel ON ThermostatLocation.thermostat_id = ThermostatModel.id;
SELECT * FROM ThermostatData WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' AND thermostat_id = 1 ORDER BY temperature DESC, timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM smart_thermostat_data;
SELECT thermostat_id, temperature, timestamp FROM smart_thermostat_data WHERE location = 'Living Room';
SELECT thermostat_id, timestamp, location FROM smart_thermostat_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM thermostat_errors WHERE error_message LIKE '%%connection%%';
SELECT location_id, location_name, latitude, longitude FROM thermostat_locations WHERE latitude > 40;
SELECT thermostat_id, temperature, timestamp FROM smart_thermostat_data WHERE temperature > 70 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM thermostat_locations WHERE latitude BETWEEN 30 AND 40 AND longitude BETWEEN -100 AND -90;
SELECT thermostat_id, error_message FROM thermostat_errors WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-02-01' ORDER BY error_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM thermostat_settings WHERE heating_enabled = TRUE AND cooling_enabled = FALSE;
SELECT thermostat_id, SUM(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM usage_duration)) AS total_usage_seconds FROM thermostat_usage GROUP BY thermostat_id HAVING total_usage_seconds > 3600;
